game.name: The Mortimer Paradox
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A third-person sci-fi horror game about exploring your grandfather’s abandoned mansion and its interdimensional portals. Solve puzzles, evade monsters, and uncover why Dr. Voss vanished.
